subject: Soccer
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
lead_paragraph: After a night in which Polish and Russian soccer fans clashed on the streets in Warsaw, the teams played a hard-fought match that ended in a 1-1 tie, leaving Poland with a chance to advance.
snippet: After a night in which Polish and Russian soccer fans clashed on the streets in Warsaw, the teams played a hard-fought match that ended in a 1-1 tie, leaving Poland with a chance to advance.
